attributes.action: That the Electors have No Confidence in this Government's Domestic,Foreign or E.U.Policies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The electors have no confidence in the Domestic,Foreign, or E.U. Policies of this Government and that the Prime Minister should call a General Election.
This Government has failed to fulfill it's Promise given to gain office that a Referendum would be called to get the approval of the People.
That the Government manipulated their proposed policies on Immigration agreed to under the E.U. agreement to allow migration from outside the E.U. to follow a policy of Multiculturalism and allow illegal immigration against the wishes of the electorate.

This petition seeks for the government to REFUSE all applications for migration from applicants from outside the E.U.
It also will Demand that the Government fulfills it's election promise t hold a referendum on the E.U. treaty of Lisbon

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
